medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent bloody stools for more than 2 years and abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began more than 2 years ago and have been intermittent in nature. There is no mention of intensity changes or factors that aggravate or relieve the symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a diagnosis of familial adenomatous polyposis (FAP) confirmed by pathologic examination after colonoscopy biopsy. Additionally, her father and aunt died from familial adenomatous polyposis.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's father and aunt died due to familial adenomatous polyposis.
